name: Steam Engine Trucker Transport
description:
You work as a delivery driver whose job is to transport things from certain point to another with a steam trucker.

It is a good old and cheap way of transportation of heavy crates, and that is what we need right now.

Our customers are already waiting for their ordered goods, so do your job, and take them these crates. Be careful to not drop the cargo, that would make our customers angry, and we would have to fire you from this job.

Try to deliver the shipment without losing it in this steampunk environment. Different mechanisms will try to prevent you completing the delivery.

Have fun.
